mapper.select: SELECT id,attribcode,attribname FROM M_DIM_NEW WHERE ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND DIMFLAG = #{dimFlag}

update M_DIM_NEW
AD_CLIENT_ID = #{adClientId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AD_ORG_ID = #{adOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBCODE = #{attribcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBNAME = #{attribname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIB_ENAME = #{attribEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
M_DIMDEF_NEW_ID = #{mDimdefNewId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

MODIFIERID = #{modifierid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

CODE = #{code,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update M_DIM_NEW set AD_CLIENT_ID = #{adClientId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AD_ORG_ID = #{adOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBCODE = #{attribcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBNAME = #{attribname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIB_ENAME = #{attribEname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, M_DIMDEF_NEW_ID = #{mDimdefNewId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIMFLAG = #{dimflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNERID = #{ownerid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MODIFIERID = #{modifierid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATIONDATE = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIEDDATE = #{modifieddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISACTIVE = #{isactive,jdbcType=CHAR}, SORTING = #{sorting,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SECURITYTYPE = #{securitytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOSTANDARD = #{dostandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select to_char(g.t_day_day,'yyyy-MM-dd') from (SELECT t.t_day_day FROM t_day t WHERE t.t_day_date >= to_number(to_char(sysdate+9,'yyyyMMdd')) AND t.t_day_day_of_week = 2 order by t.t_day_date)g where rownum < 2
SELECT GET_DATAJSON(1) AS jsonstr FROM dual
SELECT GET_PZSJSON(#{flag}, #{productId}, #{mDimNew14Id},#{mDimNew15Id},#{mDimNew16Id}) AS pzJsonstr FROM DUAL
